collection:
This privacy policy will inform you about how we collect, use,
store, protect, and process your personal information, as well as your related
rights.

## Information we collect

We may collect the following information when you use this website:

  * 1.1.

Information you provide: When you register, subscribe, participate in activities, purchase goods or use other functions on this website, we may collect necessary information such as your name, email address, mailing address, phone number, payment information, etc.

Automatically collected information: We may automatically collect information about you, including your IP address, device type, browser type and version, operating system type and version, access time, and your activities on this website.

Cookies and similar technologies: We may use cookies and similar technologies to collect and store information to improve the functionality and user experience of this website and provide relevant advertising.

We will not intentionally collect personal information from individuals under
18 years of age.
Statistical Analysis Cookies: These cookies can help us analyze access, traffic sources, page views, and other information to improve the performance and user experience of this website.
sharing:
## How we share your information

We will not sell, rent, or trade your personal information to third parties.

We may share your information with the following third parties:

  * 3.1.

Our affiliates and partners to provide the services and functions of this website; 
  * 3.2.

Third-party service providers to provide support and management services; 
  * 3.3.
Legal and law enforcement agencies to comply with legal requirements or protect our and others' legitimate rights and interests.
